title: 425: Cob Dreams + Best Of: The Angry Therapist!
itunes:title: 425: Cob Dreams + Best Of: The Angry Therapist!
description:
First The Broads catch up on Bekah’s cob house building trip while she is still in Oregon, Jess’ prophetic dream, and explain what happened regarding this episode (Jess is sending her continued apologies!) - but then stay tuned for the “Best Of…” rerelease of their episode with The Angry Therapist aka John Kim! They chat about how he got into therapy, life coaching, his unique style of coaching, divorce, getting married young, exploration of self, strong “should’s” from society, “exchanging your truth for membership”, redefining what success looks like, how difficult it is to find yourself if you’ve lost yourself in someone else, making mistakes as a parent, doing life around someone not with someone, and a whole lot more!

 

Be sure to tune in Thursday for Bekah and Jess’ recap of the latest episode of The Bachelorette!

 

JOHN KIM:

***Follow John Kim on Instagram: @theangrytherapist

***TAT LAB: https://www.instagram.com/thetatlab/?hl=en

***Check out his podcast “The Angry Therapist

***Podcast”: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/the-angry-therapist-podcast/id1298703768

***Purchase “Single On Purpose” here: https://www.barnesandnoble.com/w/single-on-purpose-john-kim/1136849822

***Find out more at his website: https://www.theangrytherapist.com/

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***SEED:  Visit SEED.COM/CHATTY and use code CHATTY to redeem 20% off your first month of Seed’s DS-01 Daily Synbiotic!

***GRAMMARLY: Go to GRAMMARLY.COM/CHATTY to sign up for a free account! And when you’re ready to upgrade to Grammarly Premium, get 20% off just for being our listener! 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
